pr_title: ci: include nvmrc file, update node to latest lts

timeline.message:
ci: include nvmrc file, update node to latest lts

nvmrc file will automatically choose the project recommended version of node when running `nvm install` or `nvm use` without passing a version.
This file can also be automatically updated by renovate (<https://docs.renovatebot.com/node/>)
chore: update typings for node to match nvmrc file
docs: update version note in readme
docs: update version note in readme

timeline.bodyText: It might also be used here to add a note that the project is now setup with .nvmrc and so node setup is as simple as nvm install / nvm use.
timeline.author: edalex-ian
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,7 +62,7 @@ In ubuntu:
 
 <https://nodejs.org/>
 
-As of the time of writing the build was tested Node v8.11.3 and NPM v5.6.0.
+As of the time of writing the build was tested Node v12.16.1 and NPM v6.13.4.

timeline.message: docs: note nvmrc version is recommended, and how to use nvm
